Text:
Thank you!  Seems to be working fine although I don't see a place to verify that it's registered.  It has the 64bit goodies including the command line rrc64.exe.

That is essential so that 64bit systems can modify the registry with a batch script.

Other than scripting I think I will continue to use Registry Workshop.  The interface is much better.  Registrar Manager also keeps crashing on me.
